thread.title: Manchester house fire: Man and four children rushed to hospital after devastating early morning blaze
thread.title_full: Manchester house fire: Man and four children rushed to hospital after devastating early morning blaze

author: Anthony Bond
title: Manchester house fire: Man and four children rushed to hospital after devastating early morning blaze
text:
Four children and a man are now in hospital (Photo: MEN) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A man and four children have been rushed to hospital after a devastating house fire in the early hours of the morning. 
Firefighters were alerted to the blaze in Withington, Manchester, at 2.20am this morning. 
The children, aged between 10 and 17-years-old, were taken to hospital in an ambulance. 
A man, whose age is unknown, is also being treated in hospital. 
The extent of their injuries is unknown at this stage. 
Police have said they have launched a joint investigation with the fire service. Like us on Facebook
